mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN NOTIFICATION N ON M.USERID = N.USERID WHERE M.USERID = #{userId} AND PASSWORD = #{password}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(USERID, PASSWORD, USERNAME, ADDRESS, EMAIL, EMAIL_VER, BIRTH, GENDER, PHONE, STATUS, CDATETIME, IS_DELETED) VALUES(#{userId},#{pwd},#{userName},#{address},#{email},#{emailVer},#{birth},#{gender},#{phoneNum},#{status},SYSDATE,'N')
mapper.select:
SELECT USERID AS userId, USERNAME AS userName, EMAIL AS email, PHONE AS phone, CDATETIME AS cDate, STATUS AS status, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_LIST O WHERE O.USERID = M.USERID) AS orderCount FROM MEMBER M
AND STATUS = #{status}
AND USERID LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND USERNAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
ORDER BY CDATETIME DESC

SELECT USERID AS userId, USERNAME AS userName, EMAIL AS email, PHONE AS phone, ADDRESS AS address, CDATETIME AS cDateTime, STATUS AS status, POINT AS point
FROM MEMBER WHERE USERID = #{memberId}
SELECT ORDER_KEY AS orderKey, ORDER_DATE AS orderDate, PRICE AS price, ORDER_STATUS AS orderStatus FROM ORDER_LIST WHERE USERID = #{memberId} ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET USERNAME = #{userName}, EMAIL = #{email}, PHONE = #{phone}, ADDRESS = #{address}, WHERE USERID = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT USERID as userId, GROUP_ID as groupId, USERNAME as userName, ADDRESS, EMAIL, BIRTH, GENDER, PHONE, STATUS, NICKNAME, GRADE, ALLERGY, POINT, CDATETIME as regDate FROM MEMBER WHERE USERID = #{userId} AND IS_DELETED = 'N'

SELECT m.GRADE, m.GROUP_ID as groupId, m.POINT, NVL(( SELECT SUM(o.PRICE) FROM ORDER_LIST o WHERE o.USERID = m.USERID AND o.ORDER_DATE >= ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1) ), 0) as monthSpent FROM MEMBER m WHERE m.USERID = #{userId}

SELECT o.ORDER_KEY as orderKey, o.ORDER_STATUS as orderStatus, TO_CHAR(o.ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as orderDate, NVL(( SELECT SUM(d.PRICE * d.COUNT - NVL(d.DISCOUNT, 0)) FROM order_details d WHERE d.ORDER_KEY = o.ORDER_KEY ), 0) as totalPrice, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM order_details d WHERE d.ORDER_KEY = o.ORDER_KEY ) as itemCount FROM ORDER_LIST o WHERE o.USERID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY o.ORDER_DATE DESC ORDER BY o.ORDER_DATE ASC ORDER BY totalPrice DESC ORDER BY totalPrice ASC ORDER BY o.ORDER_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_LIST WHERE USERID = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WISH WHERE USERID = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM WISH WHERE WISH_KEY = #{wishKey} AND USERID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUPON_NO, COUPON_NAME, DISCOUNT_AMOUNT, EXPIRE_DATE, IS_USED FROM COUPON WHERE USERID = #{userId} ORDER BY EXPIRE_DATE DESC
SELECT QS_NO, QS_TITLE, QS_CONTENTS, CDATETIME, QS_STATUS FROM QUESTION WHERE USERID = #{userId} ORDER BY CDATETIME DESC

SELECT g.GROUP_ID as groupId, d.GROUP_NAME as groupName, d.LEADER_ID as leaderId, g.JOIN_DATE as joinDate, g.ROLE as groupRole, g.STATUS as groupStatus, d.MONTH_SPENT as monthSpent FROM GROUP_INFO d JOIN GROUP_USER g ON g.GROUP_ID = d.GROUP_ID WHERE g.USERID = #{userId}
